slides.title: Pre-screening is the process of reviewing each document before we begin a new activity in the Tapestry system.
As agents, we are required to pre-screen all documents.
Pre-screening helps us know we have all of the required documents and necessary information before we start an activity in Tapestry.
You may think you don't have time to pre-screen documents.
But the fact is:  You don't have time not to!
Taking the time to review the documentation first, before you begin any activity in Tapestry, decreases errors.
If you successfully pre-screen, your chances of completing your transaction accurate and timely have increased.
And that's a very good thing!
